ygData.subject: Re: Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: The event in Qeynos Hills is tied to Jaggedpine.  The Gnolls of Blackburrow come pouring out to attack the entrance to Surefall.  The defenders are from
ygData.messageBody:
The event in Qeynos Hills is tied to Jaggedpine. The Gnolls of
Blackburrow come pouring out to attack the entrance to Surefall. The
defenders are from Surefall, all look like Wood Elves. They have
archers and regular foot soldiers. It was an awesome sight to see,
but very laggy. My meter hit 6000 before it dropped me. I've
actually seen this twice, on 2 different servers. I've seen these
guys before so it may have happened more than once. It might be a
recurring thing, like the ring war. I haven't checked that out. And
that majority of the Mobs were red to me! Defending the homeland has
a heavy price to pay!

Tuldayen Grimblade
39th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule

--- In EverQuest@y..., "Su" <suceress@k...> wrote:
> I'm blanking on OS. What is OS?
> KC might be a good idea. Thanks!
> Speaking of jaggedpine I had someone beg me to come to Qeynos Hills
with
> them to rez a bunch of people who were killed in some sort of GM
event. all
> kinds of npcs were in front of surefall glade. I hung out and
rezzed people
> then after waiting and finding they might not be able to make it
happen
> again for another hour or more I decided to head out and get some
sleep.
> Was anyone around for an event of that type in Qhills?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> Only 2 places like that are Vox's lair (only inside it where she
is, NOT
> the rest of the zone) and Naggy's lair (same thing). Any OTHER part
of the
> zone is 100% normal for all levels, and can be gone into. As for
exp...try
> Karnor's and OS. Jaggedpine might be a good bet too.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Su
> To: EverQuest@y...
> Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 12:38 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
>
>
> Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place
to hunt
> to
> get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of
order.
> Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing
the other
> parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is
there..
> does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried
that I
> will
> hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be
banished to
> zone
> beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do
the
> higher
> lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
> Any suggestions?
> luv,
> -Su
